Details: Both agents provide comprehensive analysis of Snowflake to PySpark conversion. Snowflake_to_PySpark_Converter focuses on conversion accuracy and optimization with API cost tracking. Snowflake_to_PySpark_Reviewer provides deeper technical analysis with actual code comparison and detailed recommendations.

Both outputs address the same core goal of analyzing Snowflake to PySpark conversion. They cover similar themes: conversion accuracy, discrepancies, optimization suggestions, and recommendations. However, Snowflake_to_PySpark_Reviewer provides more technical depth with actual code examples while Snowflake_to_PySpark_Converter focuses more on high-level assessment and API cost tracking.

Both follow similar analytical structure with summary, accuracy assessment, issues identification, and recommendations. However, Snowflake_to_PySpark_Reviewer has more detailed sections including complete code reference and more granular optimization suggestions. Snowflake_to_PySpark_Converter has a more concise structure with API cost tracking.
